movie_title: 490 English Words You'll Use Every Day - Basic Vocabulary #89
introduction:
This is the best video to start building your English vocabulary.
https://tinyurl.com/bdd384hv Click

vocabulary.definition: the headwaiter or manager at a restaurant responsible for welcoming guests and seating them
vocabulary.example: The maitre d' controls who gets in and who sits where.

vocabulary.definition: a system where customers serve themselves rather than being waited on by others
vocabulary.example: I went to a self-service restaurant where you have to collect your own food.

vocabulary.definition: a large jug filled with water brought to a table for shared use
vocabulary.example: The restaurant provided a picture of water for the guests to share.

vocabulary.definition: to request food from a restaurant or food delivery service
vocabulary.example: She decided to order food from her favorite restaurant for dinner.

vocabulary.definition: cuisine originating from the western regions, especially the USA and parts of Europe
vocabulary.example: Burgers and fries are classic examples of Western food.

vocabulary.definition: cuisine from diverse regions and countries, often with distinct flavors and spices
vocabulary.example: Exploring ethnic food allows you to experience different culinary traditions.
